name: SLATES (Ansel Nettles / Team SLATES)
description:
Ancient stone discs are the new growing fad among kids living by a local water bank. Stack them upon each other and try to make the stack fall down by throwing yours against them.

SLATES is a product of a 48 hour game jam with no prior experience with making an 8-bit Game Boy game. The final proof-of-concept version 0.6 was finished 30th of January, 2022.

Controls:
ᐃ — Up / 8
ᐁ — Down / 2
ᐊ — Left / 4
ᐅ — Right / 6
Ⓐ — A / Ctrl / Z 
Ⓑ — B / Alt / X

Direction and mechanics: 

  • Ansel "Ami" Nettles

Sprite art:

  • Aleksandr Tikka

Background art:

  • Emma Kantanen

Testing:

  • Teppo Pölönen 

Special thanks:

  • Pavel Arkharov

Music by krümel
